trans-unit.source: Represents a rule that checks for errors that are raised by a data source that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en regel som söker efter fel som aktiveras av en datakälla som implementerar <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] data binding model enables you to associate <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] bindning datamodellen kan du associera <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>med en <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyDataErrorValidationRule class is a built-in rule that checks for exceptions that are thrown during the updates of the binding source property.
trans-unit.target: Klassen NotifyDataErrorValidationRule är en inbyggd regel som söker efter undantag som uppstod under uppdatering av egenskapen binding källa.

trans-unit.source: You can provide custom logic to specify how the binding engine handles these exceptions by using a <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange anpassade logik för att ange hur den bindande motorn hanterar sådana undantag genom att använda en <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceExceptionFilterCallback>

trans-unit.source: An alternative syntax to setting the NotifyDataErrorValidationRule explicitly is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> property to `true` on your <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> object.
trans-unit.target: En alternativ syntax för att ange NotifyDataErrorValidationRule uttryckligen är att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>egenskapen `true` på din <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A> is `true`, so you do not need to explicitly use a NotifyDataErrorValidationRule.
trans-unit.target: Som standard värdet för <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>är `true`, så du inte behöver uttryckligen använda en NotifyDataErrorValidationRule.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidatesOnExceptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom rule by creating a class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skapa en anpassad regel genom att skapa en klass som härleds från <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ValidationRule>

trans-unit.source: For more information and a detailed discussion of data validation, see [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information och en detaljerad beskrivning av dataverifiering finns [bindning översikt över](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.NotifyDataErrorValidationRule"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Performs validation checks on a value.
The value (from the binding target) to check.
The culture to use in this rule.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen som ska användas i den här regeln.
